item.title: KT McFarland to Newsmax: Israel Should Obliterate Hamas
item.description: Former Deputy National Security Advisor KT McFarland told Newsmax on Wednesday that Israel needs to get the job done of eliminating Hamas.

item.title: James Woods Blames 'Liberal Idiots' for LA Wildfires
item.description: Actor James Woods, displaced by California wildfires and facing attacks from "liberal idiots," fired back at his social media critics Wednesday.

item.title: DOJ Only Releasing Part of Special Counsel's Trump Report for Now

item.title: European Censorship Spells Danger to Our Bill of Rights
item.description: Elon Musk of X is lucky he does not reside in France or the UK or he might be jailed. I agree with Musk that protecting kids should always be priority...
